title: England boss Gareth Southgate 'conflicted' about England future
description: England manager Gareth Southgate says he is "conflicted" about his future, having "found large parts of the last 18 months difficult".

title: Monday's gossip: Rashford, Guardiola, Mount, Gvardiol, Dalot, Felix, Ramos,
description: PSG putting together package to sign Manchester United's Rashford, Brazil's FA plans to contact Manchester City boss Guardiola, three English clubs make offers for Gvardiol, plus more.

title: Hospitals in England pay £5,200 for one agency doctor's shift
description: Figures obtained by Labour through Freedom of Information requests reveal staff pressures in the NHS.

title: King Charles and Camilla's Christmas card shows pair at Highland Games
description: They pick an image from September's Highland Games for first festive card since Charles became King.

title: Cost of living: Woman chooses mental health therapy over heating
description: Hedydd Elias says she was told in 2019 she would have to wait two-and-a-half years for NHS therapy.

title: UK weather: All flights suspended at Stansted Airport
description: Heathrow and Gatwick also cancel flights after fog and snow sweeps the country.

title: LadBaby and Martin Lewis rework Band Aid's Do They Know It's Christmas
description: The duo will make their fifth assault on the charts with a cover of Do They Know It's Christmas.

title: Four children fall into icy lake near Birmingham
description: There is no update on their condition after the incident at Babbs Mill Park on Sunday.

title: Chelsea 3-2 Reading: Leaders survive scare to move clear at top of WSL
description: Chelsea hold off Reading to move three points clear at the top of the Women's Super League in both sides' final top-flight game of 2022.

title: Women's Super League: Manchester City and Manchester United keep things interesting in title race
description: How does the Women's Super League title race shape up after Manchester City and Manchester United played out a thrilling draw on Sunday?

title: World Cup 2022: Cristiano Ronaldo coy on Portugal future as World Cup 'dream' ends
description: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo is coy about his international future as he responds to his side's World Cup exit following defeat by Morocco.

title: Heineken Champions Cup: Ospreys 17-23 Leicester: Anthony Watson try clinches Tigers win
description: A depleted Leicester clinch an away win with an efficient display at Ospreys in Pool B of the Heineken Champions Cup.

title: World Cup 2022: Gareth Southgate should remain England boss because he has unfinished business - Alan Shearer
description: Former England captain Alan Shearer says Gareth Southgate has shown he is the right man to take this exciting young team to the 2024 European Championship.

title: Owen Farrell says Eddie Jones sacking as England boss is 'unbelievably disappointing'
description: England captain Owen Farrell says the Rugby Football Union's decision to sack Eddie Jones as head coach was "unbelievably disappointing".

title: Five confirmed dead in Jersey explosion
description: Four other people are still unaccounted for, police say.

title: Kosovo: Roads blocked as violence between Serb protestors and police continues
description: Tensions between the authorities and Kosovo's Serb minority have risen in recent weeks.

title: Heineken Champions Cup: Saracens 30-26 Edinburgh - hosts come from behind to win
description: Saracens battle hard to overturn a half-time deficit and earn a 30-26 bonus-point win over Edinburgh in their Heineken Champions Cup opener.

title: Junior Eurovision: France wins song contest as UK comes fifth
description: Thirteen-year-old Lissandro won with 203 points for his song Oh Maman! at the contest in Armenia.

title: Nasa's Orion capsule makes safe return to Earth
description: After a 26-day flight around the Moon, Nasa's future astronaut ship parachutes into the Pacific.

title: World Cup 2022: Messi, France, Morocco's history-makers - the themes of the semi-finals
description: England may be out but four teams remain in the Qatar World Cup. BBC Sport looks at the subplots before two semi-finals no-one predicted.

title: Solihull: People critical after being pulled from lake
description: Emergency services are at the scene of a serious incident at Babbs Mill Park, Solihull.

title: UFC 282 talking points: Judges' controversy, Till to 'take time off' and Rosas Jr impresses
description: BBC Sport looks at the main talking points from UFC 282 as the judges' scoring in Paddy Pimblett's win and the main event attracts criticism.

title: Sunday with Laura Kuenssberg... in 60 seconds
description: Laura Kuenssberg questions guests including NHS England's medical director and the foreign secretary.

title: Would pay demands cost an extra £28bn?
description: The prime minister and health secretary both claim they would cost an extra £1,000 per household.

title: Four suspects charged in probe into European Parliament bribery by Gulf state
description: A Gulf state - reportedly Qatar - is accused of attempting to bribe parliament officials.

title: Manchester City 1-1 Manchester United: Entertaining WSL derby ends in draw
description: Manchester City play out a thrilling draw against neighbours and top-three rivals Manchester United at Etihad Stadium.

title: World Cup viewing figures: 19.4m UK viewers watch England crash out
description: The most-watched single TV channel moment of 2022 sees England lose 2-1 to France in Qatar.

title: Pakistan v England: Second Test is '50-50', says Marcus Trescothick
description: England's second Test against Pakistan is "50-50", according to assistant coach Marcus Trescothick.

title: Lockerbie bombing suspect in US custody
description: The Libyan man is accused of making the bomb which destroyed Pan Am flight 103 over Lockerbie.

title: Thor: Visiting walrus prompts warning at Calshot beach
description: The public are advised to stay away so it can regain strength before carrying on its journey.

title: World Cup 2022: Morocco run to semi-final can 'galvanise' African football
description: Morocco becoming the first African team to reach the World Cup semi-finals can "galvanise" the continent, says top Caf official.

title: Pakistan v England: Jack Leach strikes late blow on day three in Multan
description: England strike late to break a crucial Pakistan partnership on the third day of the second Test in Multan.

title: World Cup 2022: England players head home after France quarter-final defeat
description: Harry Kane says England will use their World Cup defeat by France to be "mentally and physically stronger for the next challenge" as they head home.

title: World Cup 2022: All the drama from England v France in under two minutes
description: Watch all the drama from England's World Cup quarter-final defeat by France in under two minutes.

title: World Cup 2022: Is Wales still the land of song?
description: Welsh voices filled global airwaves at the World Cup, but how much does singing matter back home?

title: Jersey explosion: No survivors found in search after blast
description: Chief Minister Kristina Moore says "we have now moved into a recovery operation".

title: UFC 282: Paddy Pimblett outpoints Jared Gordon in co-main event
description: Paddy Pimblett earns his third win of the year as he beats Jared Gordon via a unanimous decision at UFC 282.

title: Ukraine war: Odesa and Melitopol under attack
description: Russian drone attacks leave 1.5 million Ukrainians without power and Kyiv bombards occupied Melitopol.

title: Chile volcano: Alert issued after Lascar rumbles to life
description: The Lascar volcano, in the north, sends a plume of volcanic ash and hot gases 6,000m into the sky.

title: Josh Warrington: Leeds fighter loses featherweight world title to Luis Alberto Lopez
description: Leeds fighter Josh Warrington is stunned on home soil as Luis Alberto Lopez wins by majority decision to take the IBF featherweight world title.

title: 'I want people to ask about my burns'
description: Roxy Rhodes, 37, fell into a bath full of scalding hot water when she was two.

title: Plebs: Bafta nominated sitcom comes to an end
description: After ten years, Ancient Rome sitcom Plebs is coming to an end with a feature-length finale.

title: Cost of Living: Christmas takes toll on young parents
description: Mother-of-five Charlotte Chapman says positive attitude gets her through any tough times.

title: Base editing: Revolutionary therapy clears girl's incurable cancer
description: New way of altering DNA is used to engineer an "exciting", experimental therapy for a 13-year girl.

title: World Cup 2022: Argentina & Netherlands' fiery game sets yellow card record
description: See every card from Argentina's intense quarter-final match with the Netherlands, which set a World Cup record of 18 yellow cards shown in a single match.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Lion hearts broken' after England World Cup loss
description: Pictures of captain Harry Kane cover the front pages after England's World Cup loss to France.
